body:
Avicade, admittedly, had quite a few bugs and never got the attention I thought it deserved. I'd like to re-release it in the future as simply, "The Arcade". Think up some games that you would want to see there and share it here! Pav and I will be working on the games and features most anticipated by the community.

Personally, if there's one game I want to see it would be a team paintball/FFA paintball game!

replies.body:
I have a sorta long list:
  • Infection. This game is absolutely addicting IMO, basically Everyone but one person starts out as a human trying to survive, there is one zombie, however, who has like speed 2 effects and can take less damage.. The whole point of the game is to be the last human alive, or not infected.. These games involve lots of PVP, good parkour skills, and lots of strategizing! 

  • PaintBall

  • TNT run (basically, every block you step on turns into a tnt block and explodes, it's kinda like Parkour for very good people, plus it could train you for rushing in DTM/CTW sort of stuff.. So run fast!

  • More types of group parkour ( like you have to race people on your own parkour track, and have to earn the best time possible.

  • Sky wars would be nice.. I love skywars because it's all a free for all based game, but applies nebula like stuff (rushing,bridging..)

  • Guess my drawing... I know this copies Mineplex, but seriously, how bad could it be? people could be more attracted to avicus if added!!

  • Spleef/Splegg/TNT Spleef... Honestly I know a lot of people think spleef is a boring thing... But lot's of people actually really enjoy this stuff outside of Avicus. We could have maps with like multiple levels, (elevations) and breaking certain blocks could give you certain potion effects.. Ex: Breaking an Obsidian block gives you the Strength like a block of Obsidian has.. (It could be anything really).. TNT Spleef is basically like every block is destroyed by igniting it and blowing it up.. It provides a different kind of spleef experience.. Even better, We could have Tournaments! That could also attract lots of attention!

  • We could add could be just a regular kit pvp game, like you choose a custom or pre-game kit, you're put on to a team, and basically you have to fight to win! However, The team is a Free for all team! So basically it's every man for themself! This game may sound similar to Control the hill, and somewhat related to TDM, but we could have certain things 
  • Lastly, We could add a TNT war server.. You know what it means!  TNT Cannons, TNT, Redstone, and lots of Explosions!
Sorry if this list may seem long. I really want to put lot's of ideas forth, in order to give you guys a brighter glimpse on what might become the future of Avicus. I really want to make Avicus become a great server. It is great right now, but we can make it greater by adding mini games that people all around the Minecraft Universe enjoy, and would want to come back and play. I think some of these ideas I created, could really benefit the server, and boost The popularity as well! Hope everyone could take some of these ideas into consideration!! Thanks!!

replies.body:
Thanks man! I thought we could make like two huge islands and the point of the game is to blow up the other teams island and.... You could also bridge over to the islands and do some sort of PVP. I also thought that may be everyone could get like a jump boost potion to avoid blasts.. I also like the slime block idea! :D

PLEASE READ THIS!

Guys I also thought of an idea again: What if we had a game which the whole point was to actually build your own base, but you were given like 2-3 mins, and the point of the game was basically to control the base. So it's a bit like control the hill, but instead you have to capture certain beacons and change the color of the beam to your team's by standing there until the color of the beacon changes. I think that both teams should start off with a flat surface which includes a spawn and two to three beacon locations. Players can then,build defenses around these beacons. To win? Control the beacons!! So what do you guys think? Do you believe this should become a new gamempde? I do! Thanks!

Aero

replies.body:
FFA and possibly a 1v1 dueling system would be a nice implementation. I don't care about how many servers already have it but I think these two would be great additions that could also bring in some new players.

Something like One in the Quiver even with multiple bigger servers having it. It's a fun minigame and shouldn't be too hard to implement (even though I have no idea about plugin coding)

Also possibly some sort of Arms Race / Gun Game from CS or COD. With each kill you upgrade your weapon. It could be FFA or teams. You have a set amount (15 for example) of weapons (that would have custom damage in this case) that you go through and first one to do it wins.

I also think that a parkour race thing would be interesting as an arcade minigame but would need to have protection against fly hackers.

Anyway just go with something that has a possibility of attracting new players and having them stay as well as having the older players be able to enjoy them.

Maybe some classics like spleef, dropper of some sort etc. would work.

Maybe some classics like spleef, dropper of some sort etc. would work.
